body.name: New Balance Men's Fresh Foam X 1080 V12 Running Shoe
body.description: Built to give you a smooth ride on any run, the New Balance Fresh Foam X 1080 UNLACED men's running shoe combines plush comfort and modern style. The Hypoknit upper adds a soft, breathable touch, while Fresh Foam X provides comfortable cushioning underfoot to keep you going. A thoughtful laceless design allows for easy on and off, and a secure fit around your foot.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #2,721 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #18 in Men's Road Running Shoes

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our best running shoe, period If we made only one running shoe, it would be the Fresh Foam 1080. Not only is it our pinnacle running model, it’s an exercise in versatility. Its data-informed construction coupled with statement style makes for the best option for serious and casual runners alike.

An evolution in comfort The Fresh Foam X midsole is fine-tuned using new data to be extra soft with added cushioning in natural flex zones of the foot Supportive feel Lightweight, breathable Hypoknit upper provides targeted support in a streamlined design

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fit my size 16 feet well. Very comfortable with more padding than mu Saucony’s which I also like. If I had one nit; I wish they had better shoelaces….these feel really cheap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THESE SHOES!
reviews.reviewText: Yes, they are expensive. I didn't have any sneakers this expensive, but I was willing to invest in a good shoe that is both stylish and supportive for any long walks I take when I travel. They have a bulky look to them, but I personally really like it. I think it stands out in a good way and you can really feel the quality. I love that they sell them in wide options as well. Basically it's a very nice shoe, great quality, and extremely comfortable and lightweight. Worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AWESOME RUNNING SHOE!
reviews.reviewText: I have been a big fan of NB Fresh Foam shoes and I was excited when these shoes were released. Great fit out of the box and did not disappoint on my runs. Felt great at every stride and can't wait to put miles on them. Size is true to fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They start a little tight but break in really good
reviews.reviewText: These are really good shoes. Great arch support and very comfortable for walking. I ordered my true size and felt tight at first but after about 2 weeks they broke in really nicely and feel good. Still good after about 2 months. No complaints and would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Close to perfect
reviews.reviewText: A bit about me, I was looking for shoes to walk in. I use walking for exercise and the shoes I was using were ok but caused pain in certain parts of my feet. I needed to find a good pair of shoes that allowed me to walk many miles and not end up with sore feet.So let me start with the bad. These don't come in XX-wide. New Balance is known for its wide shoes, but for any of their more athletic/runner shoes, they seem to max out at X-Wide. I can wear X-Wide, but I usually end up having to buy a size up and even then they just aren't as comfy for me as an XX-wide. If these came in XXwide, I think I would give them 5 stars.My next negative, after my first walk outside, I noticed a tear in the foam of the shoe. This makes me question how durable these will be in the long run if this happened after one walk. I've done many outside walks since then and noticed no other issues so hopefully they will last at least the year.The last negative I will note is that the original pair I ordered came with an indent on the front of the shoe. This caused some irritation in my toe. I hoped I could stretch it back into shape but that didn't really work. After a few walks, I decided to just return that pair and get another. The second pair I got was perfect.Comfort-wise, they are some of the best shoes I've walked in. When I saw reviews people were talking about how plush/springy they were. I was worried I'd feel like I was walking on the moon, but it wasn't really like that. It was definitely a bit mushier feeling that my day-to-day shoes, but not in a bad way. They provided a lot of cushion between my foot and the ground, to the point the pain I had in the front of my feet while walking large distances virtually disappeared. And the bit of extra spring you do get walking in them for sure decreased my per-mile time by 15-20 seconds. That could also be because I wasn't in pain so I was able to walk faster though.I've noticed a few reviews here mention these run big. For me, I felt like maybe they ran a tad small. While I normally can get away with a 9.5 xwide, I think a 10 may have worked better.Hopefully, New Balance extends the widths of these shoes and makes xx-wide, but even if they don't I think I'll need to buy another pair once these wear out. I can't imagine trying to walk long distances in the cheaper/standard cross-training or walking shoes after walking in these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son loves these sneakers!
reviews.reviewText: My son has developed plantar fasciitis and has been looking for comfortable sneakers - well, look no more! So far these are a perfect fit. Not only do they look great, they feel great on his feet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most comfortable shoe I've ever worn
reviews.reviewText: My husband is on his 2nd pair if these shoes. According to him they are the most comfortable shoes he's ever worn. They have passed the test in various areas. Excellent quality and style for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is my second pair of Fresh Foams. I run these and Brooks Ghosts. I like both a lot. The Fresh Foams fit my feet nicely and provide a reasonably soft and stabile run. I am a slightly heavier runner (6 feet, 210 lbs.) and these shoes provide the necessary comfort and support that I need.
Son cómodos y bonitos, los materiales son distintos a la mayoría
Son unos tenis de una suela muy suave que parece que estoy caminando sobre algodon, son muy cómodos
Muy bonitos y bastante cómodos a la hora de correr. Se sienten muy ligeros.

reviews.reviewerName: Mais um autor esquerdopata que mostra a mesma narrativa da mídia tradicional , vulgarmente chamada de consórcio da Rede Goebels de televisão, que tenta dividir a população entre nós e eles. Típico estratagema anacrônico esquerdista, mas que ainda vigora nas mentes infantis de velhos senhores universitários que habitam de forma parasitária os supostos núcleos de discussão acadêmicos.
reviews.reviewText: O sistema de amortecimento não atendeu as minha expectativas. Minha pisada é forte no calcanhar, e não há proteção suficiente nesse modelo.
